      • giveCapability

        public static void giveCapability(java.lang.Long sid,
                  java.lang.String capability,
                  java.lang.Long version)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This utility method associates a particular system with a given capability. This is backend code that has not yet been implemented in Java. This type of code should NEVER EVER be seen outside of a test.
        Parameters:
        sid - Server id
        capability - Capability to add
        version - version number
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if there's a problem which should cause the test to fail.
